headline: CarMax to leave the S&P 500 to give way to this famous industrial company’s spinoff
summary: A place in the S 500 is a sought-after spot for companies, as it exposes their stock to a broad swath of active investors and to countless passive funds that track the benchmark automatically.

raw.headline: CarMax to leave the S&P 500 to give way to this famous industrial company’s spinoff
raw.summary: A place in the S 500 is a sought-after spot for companies, as it exposes their stock to a broad swath of active investors and to countless passive funds that track the benchmark automatically.

headline: The S&P 500 Adds 2 Spinoffs to the Index. Here’s Who Is Leaving.
summary: Honeywell and DuPont are hiving off companies in the coming days, and both are going into the S&P 500.
